derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, from the base of the verb user 'to use'

means.word_mean: 1. the period of time permitted by commercial usage for the payment of a bill of exchange (especially a foreign bill of exchange)
2. (economics) the utilization of economic goods to satisfy needs or in manufacturing;

sentences.sentence: "the consumption of energy has increased steadily"
